name: Halluminate
long_description:
We help foundation model labs and enterprises train computer use AI agents with data and sandboxes.

A knowledge worker spends 90% of their day on a computer. A productive AI agent must similarly learn how to use our computers, browsers, and software to deliver real world value. 

Today, browser and computer use AI is inaccurate, slow, and expensive. Model labs and enterprises who want to improve these agents are bottlenecked by two resources: 

1) High quality datasets for benchmarking and evaluations
2) Realistic sandbox environments for safe and accurate testing/training (ex. a simulated version of Salesforce) 

Halluminate offers a suite of products and services to address both these issues. 

Our evaluation service combines proprietary datasets with high quality annotations to help our customers identify and prioritize the biggest failure modes of their computer- and browser- use AI. 

Our platform provides a catalog of fully managed sandboxes, empowering our customers to safely and accurately test/train at scale, resulting in improved performance. 

Our customers see
- Improved browser- and computer-use agent performance
- New and emergent frontier agent capabilities
- Data driven prioritization leading to exponentially faster development speed
- Increased revenue/sales via marketing from public benchmarks

Our paying customers already include leading computer use model labs and the two largest browser agent companies in the space. 

Wyatt and Jerry are friends that met their first week of school studying CS at Cornell University. Theyâ€™ve been working and studying together for 7+ years.
one_liner: Data and environments to train computer use AI

name: Cyberdesk
long_description:
Cyberdesk is an open source, self hostable fleet of virtual desktops. We expose a simple API to start and control hundreds of virtual desktops, perfect for building computer use agents that automate repetitive, boring desktop tasks (like data entry).

Under the hood, we handle the provisioning of the desktops, a warm pool (for fast boot up times), and sending commands. 

Most importantly, we are fully open source and self-hostable on any Kubernetes cluster, which makes us perfect for agent developers automating in regulated industries such as healthcare, finance, insurance, and more.
one_liner: Self hostable fleet of virtual desktops to build computer use agents

name: Skope
long_description: Weâ€™re building an autonomous revenue engine for nonprofit fundraisers, powered by AI agents. Skope allows organizations to enrich human profiles and make sense of their old data, while constantly finding new ideal donors.

name: Dash
one_liner: Agent that connects to Gmail, Slack, Calendar, etc.

name: Summon
long_description:
Summon is the complete end-to-end MCP platform. We're building the pipes connecting context to client applications for the agent economy. 

Summon transforms MCP development from a fragmented, manual process into an AI-first, collaborative workflow. We build MCP servers from OpenAPI specs using our AI agent, provide debugging playgrounds, run continuous evaluations against different LLMs, and offer enterprise hosting with observability. This creates a complete virtuous loop where AI builds, maintains, and improves MCP integrations, accelerating time-to-market, reducing bugs, and aligning developers, QA, and product teams.

With MCP gaining adoption across ChatGPT, Claude, and Microsoft Copilot, companies need agent-accessible APIs to remain competitive.

name: Perseus Defense
long_description:
Perseus Defense is building a mass-manufactured Counter UAS solution for the Department of Defense and Department of Homeland Security. Current solutions are one-to-one, too dangerous for use on U.S. soil, and orders of magntiude more expensive than the threats they defeat. Our micro-guided missile system is man-portable, multi-domain capable, and has both forward-deployed and low-collateral defeat variants. It senses, engages, and eliminates threats with drastically reduced cost per engagement. 

Solving this critical national security problem requires understanding complex DoD needs along with actual rocket science including aerodynamics, guidance, navigation, control, and much more. Jason and Steve met at Penn State while they pursued a PhD and MS in aerospace engineering, respectively. Their past experiences designing space helicopters for NASA, making Boeing airliners land autonomously, controlling swarms of unmanned autonomous systems, teaching aerospace engineering at Stanford, winning multiple ONR and DOE engineering competitions, and founding an international drone competition makes them the perfect team to create transformative solutions protecting our service members. 

"If you build this, it will be mandatory equipment for every truck, boat, and convoy in the U.S. Military. We're talking thousands of units." - Former DoD Procurement Officer

The White House just released Executive Order, "Unleashing American Drone Dominance" which adds billions of dollars, government support, and streamlined regulations to enable the development of our product. 

Traction: 
A UAS prototype was designed and built in one week and a prototype of the guided missile was prototyped in four days. Following the Stanford Hacking for Defense process that Perseus Defense adviser and former Army Ranger Dr. Jeff Decker wrote the book on, Jason and Steve used 60 end-user interviews across the DoD and DHS to shape the product to something of critical need to both boots on the ground and DoD purchasers. Perseus has already been invited to a Phase-II in-person pitch of their solution to government end-users, signaling progress towards contract opportunities.

name: Idler
one_liner: AI employees that handle the work, so people can do the magic.

name: Altur
one_liner: AI agents for debt collection and sales

name: Pally
long_description:
Hey ðŸ‘‹,Â weâ€™re Haz and Wyatt, the founders of Pally, and weâ€™re building at the intersection of AI and Human Relationships. 

We believe that while AI will automate a lot of low-level tasks, that this will dramatically increase the value of human connection at the highest level.

In a world full of â€˜AI SDRsâ€™, our warm connections become more important than ever. 

Yet today, keeping track of thousands of connections across countless social platforms is impossible. We forget to respond, we miss important moments, we lose touch.  

Weâ€™re building Pally to solve that. 

We bring together every connection, across every platform. Our AI researches everything theyâ€™ve ever posted online, and uses its deep understanding of each person to help you achieve your goals; whether hiring, fundraising, or sales.
one_liner: Pally is an AI Relationship Management Platform

name: Reacher
long_description:
Reacher automates affiliate marketing for enterprise brands, replacing teams of 5+ people with AI-powered creator discovery, outreach, and management. 

Trusted by brands driving $20M+ in GMV, we're building the largest marketplace where creators access premium deals guided by an AI talent manager, while brands access our vetted network of top creators.
one_liner: AI platform to scale brand x creator partnerships 10x faster

name: Magnetic
long_description:
Magnetic scans client documents - from handwritten charity notes to excel spreadsheet Schedule Cs to multi-state K-1s - and enters them into tax software automatically, saving hours of tedious data entry. 

The accounting profession is facing a massive talent shortage, as graduates choose different professions and the old guard begins to retire. As a result, CPA and tax preparation firms are awash in clientele, but unable to keep up. At many firms, phones go unanswered, clients are "fired", and websites are taken down, as the existing workforce tries to handle the grueling 80 hour+ weeks necessary to push through tax season to the April 15th deadline.

We built this because a former colleague who owns her own tax firm asked us to automate her workload, and we quickly realized the massive opportunity. Thomas brings deep domain expertise as the former Head of Product at Keeper (YC W19), where he built tax engine automation systems and an OCR form scanning system that outperformed everything else on the market. At Keeper, he leveraged early access to OpenAI's LLMs (well before ChatGPT) to build systems that automated the entire tax filing process, allowing a tiny team of CPAs to process thousands of returns with near zero busy work. Patrick was the first engineer at FunCraft, shipping multiple mobile games with 1M+ downloads and building scalable shared codebases. We've worked together since 2017, including co-leading multiple teams at Zynga as PM & Tech Lead respectively.

We launched this year in the middle of tax season and quickly processed hundreds of returns, earning thousands in ARR, and since tax season we've been growing customers by >30% month-over-month. We've completely automated over 25% of the return process so far and developed a proprietary vision model that beats incumbent scanning technology by almost 2x on accuracy - jumping from 50% field-level accuracy to 89%, approaching the quality of their expensive human-verified service at 92%.

The opportunity is massive - there are 80M US personal tax returns filed via professionals annually, in a $2B outsourcing market where individual CPA firms currently pay $100k-$1M per year for inferior services. We're positioned to capture significant market share by offering better accuracy & document coverage, instant processing, and superior user experience.

We've built this kind of software before, we've worked together for years (and even lived together), we've built products to $10M ARR before, and we have the grit to outwork anyone in this space.

name: Vulcan Technologies
long_description:
Vulcan primarily offers two different AI services for two different constituencies:
1) Automatic regulatory drafting for executive branch agencies in government and 
2) Regulatory compliance and comment for industry
Beneath these tools is a proprietary system that we call "intelligent legal cartography," an automatic mapping of relationships between statutes, regulations, and case law. In short: Vulcan equips agencies to comply with changing state and federal law, and enables business to comment, contest, and comply with regulatory requirements.

name: RealRoots
long_description: We are a marketplace that helps women make new friends in her city via curated matching and guided shared experiences. Users fill out a 10-minute survey, and we match her with a group of compatible women nearby. The group then enjoys a series of 6 bonding experiences, leaving with at least one new friend -- guaranteed.

name: Uplift AI
long_description:
We build speech understanding and speech generation models for the five major languages spoken in Pakistan, where 42% of the adult population can not read any language. 

Pakistan is the 5th most populous country in the world with a $411 billion GDP. Yet its overlooked and no practical voice models exist for the local languages.

With our APIs and SDKs, businesses offer high-quality voice interfaces in domains like banking, agriculture, healthcare, and government services. This enables them to finally offer digital services to every customer -- often for the first time.

Our founding team has a decade of experience building world-leading voice products, including at Alexa and Siri. We have launched entire AWS services; and software written by us previously is used by millions daily.

We do in-house research and development. We gather our own data, then train and deploy our own models. We own our technology stack end-to-end.

We are on a mission to uplift entire nations through better access to digital information and digital services.
one_liner: Foundational Voice AI for underserved languages
